languages.text: {n}Мутант шумно втягивает воздух.{/n} "От тебя несет кровью. Это скверно — в этом месте полно охотников до такого запаха. Пойду-ка я".
{n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."
languages.original_text: {n}Мутант шумно втягивает воздух.{/n} "От тебя несет кровью. Это скверно — в этом месте полно охотников до такого запаха. Пойду-ка я".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good — that smell attracts a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}変異体は大きな音を立てて匂いを嗅ぐ。{/n}「血の臭いがする。気味が悪い。この辺りでは、この匂いは気を引きすぎる。俺はもう行く」
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体は大きな音を立てて匂いを嗅ぐ。{/n}「血の臭いがする。気味が悪い。この辺りでは、この匂いは気を引きすぎる。俺はもう行く」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}变种人乞丐大声地嗅着空气。{/n}“你浑身都是血的臭味，这可不太好。这种味道会吸引很多人的注意，我得赶紧走了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人乞丐大声地嗅着空气。{/n}“你浑身都是血的臭味，这可不太好。这种味道会吸引很多人的注意，我得赶紧走了。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mutante olisquea el aire ruidosamente.{/n} «Apesta a sangre. Eso no es bueno. Ese olor llama mucho la atención por aquí. Yo me largo».
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante olisquea el aire ruidosamente.{/n} «Apesta a sangre. Eso no es bueno. Ese olor llama mucho la atención por aquí. Yo me largo».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant hält die Nase in die Luft und schnuppert laut und theatralisch.{/n} "Ihr stinkt nach Blut. Das ist nicht gut. Der Geruch zieht hier jede Menge Aufmerksamkeit an. Ich verschwinde."
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant hält die Nase in die Luft und schnuppert laut und theatralisch.{/n} "Ihr stinkt nach Blut. Das ist nicht gut. Der Geruch zieht hier jede Menge Aufmerksamkeit an. Ich verschwinde."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mutant se met à humer l'air.{/n} « Vous empestez le sang. Ça craint. Avec une odeur pareille, vous risquez d'attirer l'attention de créatures peu recommandables. Moi, je me tire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant se met à humer l'air.{/n} « Vous empestez le sang. Ça craint. Avec une odeur pareille, vous risquez d'attirer l'attention de créatures peu recommandables. Moi, je me tire. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mutant birdenbire havayı kokluyor.{/n} "Kan kokuyorsun. Bu iyi değil. Kan kokusu buralarda çok dikkat çeker. Ben kaçayım."
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant sniffs the air loudly.{/n} "You reek of blood. That's not good. That smell draws a lot of attention 'round these parts. I'm outta here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, havayı horuldanarak kokluyor.{/n} "Kan kokuyorsun. Bu, iyi değil. O koku buralarda çok dikkat çeker. Ben kaçayım."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
